amendment.description: To amend the National Science Foundation program on research on the science of dyslexia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3279 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3279 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Lee.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3279 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
